condition.description: The bi-entity condition type to check for.
condition.markdownDescription: The bi-entity condition type to check for.

type.description:
## Undirected

---


[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/undirected)

Checks if the specified bi-entity condition is true before or after swapping the actor and target context.

Type ID: `origins:undirected`

---

### Examples

```json
"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:undirected",
	"condition": {
		"type": "origins:owner"
	}
}
```

This example will check if the actor entity is the owner of the target entity, or if the target entity is the owner of the actor entity.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Undirected (Bi-entity Condition Type) date: 2021-10-12

Undirected

Bi-entity Condition Type

Checks if the specified bi-entity condition is true before or after swapping the actor and target context.

Type ID: origins:undirected

Fields

Field Type Default Description
condition Bi-entity Condition Type The bi-entity condition type to check for.

Examples

"bientity_condition": {
	"type": "origins:undirected",
	"condition": {
		"type": "origins:owner"
	}
}

This example will check if the actor entity is the owner of the target entity, or if the target entity is the owner of the actor entity.
